revised_title: A Generalized Theory of Fatigue Crack Propagation: Analytical Approximations and Integral Equation
tldr: This article presents a generalized theory of fatigue crack propagation based on the linear accumulation of metallurgical damage. The authors derive an integral equation that governs the growth of the fatigue crack and provide successive analytic approximations to the solution. The resulting crack growth law predicts a crack length at which catastrophic failure occurs, offering a more accurate and generalized approach to understanding fatigue crack propagation.
